package.name: basic-emojis
package.author: Federico Terzi
package.description: A package to include some basic emojis in espanso.
package.title: Basic Emojis

manifest.author: Federico Terzi
manifest.description: A package to include some basic emojis in espanso.
manifest.name: basic-emojis
manifest.title: Basic Emojis

value.readme:
A simple package to bring basic emojis to espanso.
It works by replacing keywords like `:lol` with ``. More details below.

### Installation

Install the package with:

```
espanso install basic-emojis
```

### Usage

This package replaces the following keywords with the associated emoji while you're
typing:

Keyword | Emoji
--- | ---
`:lol` | 
`:llol` | 
`:sad` | 
`:ssad` | 光光光
`:sml` | 
`:strong` | 
`:stlol` | 
`:ba` | 
`:ok` | 
`:ook` | 
`:happy` | 
`:cry` | 
`:wow` |

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  - trigger: ":lol"
    replace: ""
  - trigger: ":llol"
    replace: ""
  - trigger: ":sad"
    replace: ""
  - trigger: ":ssad"
    replace: "光光光"
  - trigger: ":sml"
    replace: ""
  - trigger: ":strong"
    replace: ""
  - trigger: ":stlol"
    replace: ""
  - trigger: ":ba"
    replace: ""
  - trigger: ":ok"
    replace: ""
  - trigger: ":ook"
    replace: ""
  - trigger: ":happy"
    replace: ""
  - trigger: ":cry"
    replace: ""
  - trigger: ":wow"
    replace: ""
